name: Microsoft Defender Loading DLL from Nondefault Path
description: Detects loading of Microsoft Defender's DLLs by its processes (MpCmdRun and NisSrv) from the non-default directory which may be an attempt to sideload arbitrary DLL
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:(*\\MpCmdRun.exe OR *\\NisSrv.exe) AND file.path:*\\mpclient.dll) AND (NOT (file.path:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\Windows\ Defender\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Windows\ Defender\\* OR C\:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\Platform\\*))))`
